title: 003: The Problem with Kids Today
description: Every generation looks at the next and sees how things have "gone downhill." In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin (All generation X) examine Generation Y and the effect that political correctness and instant gratification has had on the youth today.
content:encoded: Every generation looks at the next and sees how things have "gone downhill." In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin (All generation X) examine Generation Y and the effect that political correctness and instant gratification has had on the youth today.
